Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Retrieval \Re*triev"al\, n. The act retrieving. [1913 Webster]

retrieval n 1: (computer science) the operation of accessing information from the computer's memory 2: the cognitive operation of accessing information in memory; "my retrieval of people's names is very poor" 3: the act of regaining or saving something lost (or in danger of becoming lost) [syn: {recovery}]
